content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/python/mypy.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python image as a base image
FROM python:3.11

# Set the working directory in the container
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install necessary dependencies for the project
RUN pip install -U pip
RUN pip install -r test-requirements.txt

# Install the project from source
RUN pip install -U .

# Run the test suite to verify the setup
RUN pytest
